SELECT p.num num, title, thumbnail, project_info, target, payment_summary.total_amount total_amount, p.end_date end_date FROM project p JOIN projectRequest pr ON p.num = pr.num LEFT OUTER JOIN category c ON pr.category_num = c.category_num LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT pd.num, SUM(s.sum) AS total_amount FROM product pd LEFT JOIN sales s ON pd.product_num = s.product_num GROUP BY pd.num) payment_summary ON p.num = payment_summary.num LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT num, COUNT(*) likeCount FROM projectLike GROUP BY num) pl ON pl.num = p.num
AND p.end_date > SYSDATE AND p.block = 0

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM projectLike WHERE num = #{num} AND memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT review_num, r.content content, r.grade, m1.nickName, TO_CHAR(r.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, m1.profile_img, m1.memberIdx FROM review r JOIN sales s ON r.sales_num = s.num JOIN payment p ON s.payment_num = p.payment_num JOIN member1 m1 ON m1.memberIdx = p.memberIdx WHERE project_num = #{num} ORDER BY reg_date DESC
